XM1014 is the greatest gun in the game don't @ me. It's the best for close range, and is basically an AWP at long range. There is nothing the auto shotty cannot do, it even carried me thru to silver III (I know, pretty high tier gameplay).

This game is free. Was definitely worth it when it was paid imoimo. A great shooter with interesting maps and strategies to improve on over time, with high replayability. Even after 7 years, this game is still alive and thriving, with random updates to the maps looks and whatnot and a big competitive scene. Regardless of whether or not you play to win or play to have fun, CSGO fulfills your hard on quite well. 91/99, 19/99 if you buy skins or have a csgo crate site in your name
Dont forget to buy a smoke
